Translations.Text: [Jinshi] jingxiang zhuizhu mingli yi shi nimen shuhu [luxing zongjiao gongxiu],
bu, jiaru nimen zhidao zhenshi de zhishi [jingxiang zhuizhu mingli de houguo, nimen biding tingzhile].
Nimen bi jiang kanjian huo yu.
Ranhou, nimen bi jiang qinyan kanjian ta;
ranhou, zai na ri, nimen bi jiang bei shenwen [nimen zai chenshi suo xiangshou de] enhui.
